subject: Order #SSN4363
description_text:
Hello,

Would you be able to tell me, when can you ship out my order #SSN4363 ?

It has been a while since I made the order.

Thank you

-- 
Best,
Arvid Tampuu
Fookus Pookus Grip

conversations.body_text: Hi Arvid Tampuu,    We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund your additional shipping fees.

Hello,
The merchandise is still not shipped out, it has been weeks already. Please
tell me when can i expect the order or a refund?

Best,
Arvid Tampuu
Fookus Pookus Grip


On Tue, 9. Dec 2025 at 11:18, service@simsonn.com

Hi Arvid Tampuu,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They arrived today, and we have now shipped your order and updated your shipping notification.
